scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:prod: cd client && npm ci --only=production && npm run build && cd ../server && npm ci --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
